text: @FLOTUS @POTUS So many deaths on your husband's watch. So many more will die because of him. Worst first lady in history! #coronavirus #COVID #TrumpIsKillingUs #TrumpVirus #TrumpResignNow #EndThisNightmare #WearAMask #WeakPresident https://t.co/rBlyMhdtQw
